translation.description: The annual Malaysian Well-being Index (MyWI) Report is published to measure the well-being of Malaysians from an economic and social perspective. It provides a holistic synthesis of various economic and social statistics, broken down into 5 economic and 9 social components. This dashboard summarises Malaysia’s well-being indices from 2000 to the present.

section_timeseries.title: How are Malaysia’s well-being indices trending?

section_economy.title: A breakdown of economic well-being indices

section_social.title: A breakdown of social well-being indices

tooltip.overall: Comprised of 5 Indikator Ekonomi Dan 9 Indikator Sosial
tooltip.economy_transport:
Underlying Indicators:
- Number of Railway Passengers
- Ownership of Private Cars and Motorcycles
- Road Length per Capita
- Road Development Index (RDI)
tooltip.economy_comms:
Underlying Indicators:
- Fixed and Mobile Telephone Lines Subscriptions
- Internet Subscriptions
- Number of Domain Names
tooltip.economy_educ:
Underlying Indicators:
- Pre-school Participation Rate
- Literacy Rate
- Percentage of Candidates passing (SPM)
- Number of Lecturers with PhD
- Primary School Participation Rate
- Secondary School Participation Rate
- Primary School Completion Rate
- Secondary School Completion Rate
- Tertiary Participation Rate
- Percentage of Graduate Teachers in Secondary School
- Percentage of Graduate Teachers in Primary School
tooltip.economy_income:
Underlying Indicators:
- Real Gross National Income per Capita
- Gini Coefficient
- Incidence of Poverty
tooltip.economy_work:
Underlying Indicators:
- Industrial and Travel Accidents Rate
- Average Working Hours
- Man-days Lost Due to Industrial Actions
- Trade Disputes
tooltip.social_housing:
Underlying Indicators:
- Percentage of Low Cost Housing Units to the Number of B40 Households
- Percentage of Households with Treated Water Supply
- Percentage of Households with Electric Supply
- Percentage of Households with Garbage Collection Services
- Number of Persons per Room
tooltip.social_entertainment:
Underlying Indicators:
- Number of Domestic Hotel Guests
- Number of Households with Paid TV Subscriptions
- Number of Recreational Park Visitors
- Number of Cinemagoers
tooltip.social_safety:
Underlying Indicators:
- Number of Road Accidents
- Crime Rate
tooltip.social_participation:
Underlying Indicators:
- Membership of RELA
- Number of registered residents associations
- Number of Registered Non-profit Organizations
tooltip.social_governance:
Underlying Indicators:
- Number of e-Payment Transactions
- Percentage of e-Filling Users
- Percentage of Corruption Cases Prosecuted
- Percentage of Cases Solved by Public Complaints Bureau
tooltip.social_culture:
Underlying Indicators:
- Number of Membership in Public Libraries and National Libraries
- Number of Istana Budaya Visitors
- Number of Craft Complex Visitors
- Number of Museum Visitors
tooltip.social_health:
Underlying Indicators:
- Life Expectancy at Birth
- Infant Mortality Rate
- Maternal Mortality Rate
- Number of Non-communicable Disease cases
- Doctor to Population Ratio
- Percentage of Patients Whose Waiting Time is Less Than 90 Minutes
- Number of Beds in Hospitals
- Number of Communicable Disease Cases
tooltip.social_environment:
Underlying Indicators:
- Water Quality
- Air Quality
- Percentage of Forested Land
- Quantity of Scheduled Waste Generated
- Maximum Mean Temperature
tooltip.social_family:
Underlying Indicators:
- Divorce Rate
- Dependency Ratio
- Domestic Violence Cases
- Household Debt Per Capita
- Children Involved in Crime
- Mean Monthly Household Income
